title: Can rushing a romantic relationship potentially ruin it? How? - Quora

response.answer_text: I call it "spoiling your goose" from this book I read called Johnny Tremain. (The book isn't important, but in one part of the book the protagonist makes a mistake and says he "overcooked his goose" in case you're curious) Back on topic, rushing a relationship isn't something I recommend because it can snowball into doing something you didn't want to do. Also it can't lead to problems growing a strong relationship. Thus, don't spoil your goose.
